headline: Doral Renewables Secures $1.5 Billion of Debt and Tax Equity Financing for the Completion of Mammoth Solar
summary: Doral Renewables LLC ("Doral") has successfully closed construction project financing for the Mammoth South, Mammoth Central I, and Mammoth Central II solar projects in Pulaski County, Indiana. The three projects, each with a generation capacity of 300 MWac, are part of the broader 1.3 GW Mammoth Solar facility. Mammoth Solar will generate enough energy to power approximately 275,000 households annually.
